issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Not specifying the target build platform returns 
an [ERROR] Unable to find an iOS Developer Certificate for ""

Test steps:
1. Run ti build -T device
2. Chose ios
Actual result:
1. Target platform [android,ios,mobileweb,tizen]:
2. [ERROR] and Available developer names:
fields.summary: CLI: User is not correctly prompted for missing development certificate in some cases
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.3.201302201202
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.0.v20130313215655
CLI 3.0.25
